Package milestone4

Class Item

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • milestone4.Item
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
    public class Item
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    Item class has the properties of items such as picture, name, price, and discounted price. It uses ImageIcon.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
